base: Confirm proposal backend/model_script mapping before execution.
Review baseline and policy profile selection for this environment.
medium_extra: Pre-assign human reviewer for performance/runtime deviations.
high_extra: Pre-approve rollback path and escalation owner before execution.
changeset_extra: Review change-set diff against target files before execution.

runtime_regression: Attach a runtime-delta justification and expected production impact.
performance_regression_detected: Validate performance checker threshold and provide mitigation or acceptance note.
event_explosion_detected: Review event traces and confirm no unsafe mode-switch amplification.
nan_inf_detected: Block merge until numerical instability root cause is explained and fixed.
timeout_detected: Block merge until timeout root cause is identified and reproduced.
proposal_backend_mismatch: Fix proposal/baseline/candidate backend alignment before any approval.
proposal_model_script_mismatch: Fix proposal/baseline/candidate model_script alignment before any approval.
change_apply_failed: Repair change_set content and re-run with fresh evidence.
change_preflight_failed: Fix preflight violations (scope/path/filetype) before any re-run.
change_requires_human_review: Auto-apply is disabled for this risk level under industrial_strict_v0. Manual approval required.

docker_error: Restore backend runtime availability before rerun.

fallback: Human review required: inspect policy_reasons and evidence artifacts before merge.
